content: Tell me a joke about animals and music.

Why don't seagulls fly out to sea? Because they might get soup! Okay, that's a classic, but I think I can come up with something better for you. How about this one: Why did the musician get kicked out of the orchestra? Because he kept tuning in and out! Haha, I know, it's a bit of a pun, but I hope you found it amusing.
